description: It was a cold night and I was walking with my camera through the city center looking for a nice straight guy to talk him into his first gay sex for cash. But this time someone approached me. Actually a knight, or as I found out a student from Slovakia who was dressed as a knight talking to people on the street and inviting them to a medieval restaurant. He told me that the salaries are better here and that he almost every weekend comes here because he also has a girlfriend in Prague. So far so good. I felt that some nice cash would come handy for him so I tried to convince him to give me a hand-job. He hesitated a lot but when I considerably raised my offer he finally agreed. And to my own surprise he seemed to enjoy what happened next... Was he a good actor?
title: Czech Hunter 220
